text: Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjetvā paribhuñjeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjetvā paribhuñjeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 47. Should any bhikkhunī use a menstrual cloth without having forfeited it (after her previous period), it is to be confessed.
